dental.name: Reception 24/7 Agent
dental.howItWorks: Answers 24/7, provides info (hours, pricing, availability), sends WhatsApp estimates, books visits

dental.name: Review Booster Agent
dental.howItWorks: Contacts happy patients post-visit, guides to Google review; routes negatives to support

dental.name: Treatment Plan Closer Agent
dental.howItWorks: Schedules treatment plans, follows up on commitments, and manages patient concerns

hvac.name: Reception 24/7 Agent
hvac.howItWorks: 24/7 call handling, emergency triage, appointment scheduling, and customer service

hvac.name: Emergency Management Agent
hvac.painPoint: Emergency response delays & missed urgent calls
hvac.howItWorks: Instant emergency call routing, technician dispatch, and customer status updates

hvac.name: Quote Follow-Up Agent
hvac.howItWorks: Systematic follow-up on pending quotes with decision assistance
